article_title: Corporate tax dodgers might make Congress actually do something
article_text:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

twitter.title: Corporate tax dodgers might make Congress actually do something
twitter.description: If there’s an epicenter for the new rash of corporate inversions, surely it’s Chicago’s North Shore. Just this year, the wealthy suburban cluster of corporate headquarters has seen several of...

article_metadata.news_keywords: tax inversions, congress, abbvie, taxes, u.s. congress
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Corporate tax dodgers might make Congress actually do something
article_metadata.description: It's unlikely, but if more companies join the scramble to leave the U.S. for tax purposes, Congress may very well break its habit and pass some legislation.
